Mobiles.Name: Nergal
Mobiles.Short_Description: Nergal, The Ventrue Lord is here
Mobiles.Long_Description: Nergal, The Ventrue Lord stands here reeking of death
Mobiles.Description: The Ventrue Lord looks back at you!

Rooms.Name: The room of the Vampire Lords
Rooms.Description: You are standing in a dank, musky room. The odours of decay spread around you, filling your every pore with the essence of death and decay. On the borders of your senses you can tell you are not alone in here.
